item.title: How to Bypass Restrictive Firewalls and Proxies with Cloudflare WARP (1.1.1.1)
item.description: If you’re a student or researcher, you’ve likely encountered that frustrating “Access Denied” screen when trying to reach a legitimate website, software repository, or gaming service on campus. University networks often use strict firewalls or transparent proxies to limit bandwidth and enforce security policies, but this can severely hamper your ability to study or relax.
